boardgame.description: All Hands on Deck!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There's adventure to be had on the high seas when a group of press-ganged pirates becomes embroiled in the plots and plunder of the Shackles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;an infamous island chain dominated by pirate warlords. But as these new swashbucklers make names for themselves, rival scalawags, enemy navies, legendary sea monsters, and the infamous Hurricane King himself seek to see them walk the plank. Who will survive when there's loot on the line?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Launch a campaign to control the Shackles with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Shackles Base Set. This complete cooperative strategy card game pits 1 to 4 heroes against the traps, monsters, deadly magic, and despicable foes of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s award-winning Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Shackles Adventure Path. Choose your character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s class; build a deck of allies, equipment, and magic; and explore lethal locations as you journey through multiple scenarios in an exciting fantasy adventure. Characters grow stronger after each game, adding unique gear and awesome magic to their decks, and gaining incredible powers, all of which they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll need to challenge greater threats in a complete Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Adventure Path._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Shackles Base Set includes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Nearly 500 cards, featuring a richly customizable assortment of equipment and magic, and dozens of allies, monsters, and villains from the Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Shackles Adventure Path._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 7 character classes to choose from, including 4 brand-new ones: Gunslinger, Magus, Oracle, and Swashbuckler; 3 returning characters: Bard, Fighter, and Rogue. Returning characters from Rise of the Runelords are new versions for this game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Wormwood Mutiny Adventure Deck, the beginning of the Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Shackles Adventure Path._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A complete set of 5 polyhedral dice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The contents of Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Shackles Base Set is:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 rulebook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;400 cards:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7 character cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7 role cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;7 token cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 adventure path card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 adventure card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 scenario cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;28 location cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 villain cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;36 henchmen cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;34 monster cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;18 barrier cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;52 weapon cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;33 spell cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;22 armor cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;37 item cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;32 ally cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;68 blessing cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6 ship cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1 fleet card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s adventure to be had on the high seas when a group of press-ganged pirates becomes embroiled in the plots and plunder of the Shackles-an infamous island chain dominated by pirate warlords. But as these new swashbucklers make names for themselves, rival scalawags, enemy navies, legendary sea monsters, and the infamous Hurricane King himself seek to see them walk the plank. Who will survive when there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s loot on the line? Launch a campaign to control the Shackles with the Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Shackles Base Set. This complete cooperative strategy card game pits 1 to 4 heroes against the traps, monsters, deadly magic, and despicable foes of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s award-winning Skull _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Shackles Adventure Path. Choose your character_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s class; build a deck of allies, equipment, and magic; and explore lethal locations as you journey through multiple scenarios in an exciting fantasy adventure. Characters grow stronger after each game, adding unique gear and awesome magic to their decks, and gaining incredible powers, all of which they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to challenge greater threats in a complete Pathfinder Adventure Card Game Adventure Path.

Played twice. Has light pencil marks on a couple of the character cards - these can be rubbed out. I also have expansion packs for sale. Look at my profile for details. Postage is £5.28 with My Hermes. Contact me for other carriers or to meet in central/SW London to save on shipping. I will provide discounts for multiple purchases.

Opened, played once, put back in the box. Shipping: Buyer pays for fully insured and tracked shipping, which will be $10 if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re close to Indiana, and $20+ if you are far from Indiana. Payment: I take Paypal, USPS Money Orders, and Walmart Money Orders. Bitcoin works too.

Skull and shackles base set. Includes character add on deck and all 6 adventure paths. Also includes are the promo cards that came with the subscription. All cards are sleeved and in mint condition and in a custom foam Insert I made. Original plastic insert is available instead. Box has shipping damage in one corner. Cheers
Reserved for senorcoo

Skull and Shackles Base set - with Character add on deck. All cards are in mint condition, and sleeved. Manual is in excellent Condition. Dice are still wrapped Box has minor damage in corner which happened during shipping. Cant post pics if required.
Reserved for the winner of The Long View Spring Clean auction user flyintheoil
Reserved for auction winner krclark. Includes shipping. Thanks for bidding!
